English: I was born a long time ago in a village
Español: Yo nací hace tiempo en un pueblo en un pueblo propiamente
Dominant_Hand: PASADO(2Msu) PUEBLO INDX.PRO:1sg NACER ES.ASÍ PUEBLO

English: (When I was) a child communication was...

Español: A (mis) padres (no) los entendía en absoluto

English: (The one) I understood best was a child friend of (mine)
Español: (A quién) más a una niña compañera (mía)

English: Both of us could communicate with each other
In our own way/using our code we could [communicate].
Español: a su manera/en su código las dos podíamos [comunicarnos].

English: (Everything) went on well I enjoyed [that time] (really) well
I was taken to Lugo to the school
Español: me llevaron a Lugo al colegio
(Lo que) se hablaba yo lo entendía.

English: After class I communicated easily with the children outside [on the playground].
Español: Después fuera [en el patio] me comunicaba cómodamente con los niños.

English: I used to enjoy communicating a lot.
I used to enjoy communicating a lot.
After that I returned to the village
There was no communication (with my) parents
I had the same girl friend
(The one) I used to communicate with the same one
Español: (con la que) me comunicaba esa misma

English: After that I returned [to school in Lugo]
I returned back to the village

Español: yo no no me sentía a gusto

English: (And) they told me I was free to choose
